thread.title: Elle Jones
thread.title_full: Servicing Stop reviewed by Elle Jones

author: Elle Jones
title: Elle Jones
text: I have just received a phone call to say that they can no longer pick up my car for it's service and MOT tomorrow. When I was put through to the garage they said I could drop in off myself (45mins away) but they can't guarantee they will fit me in. It is 19:30 and now I don't have time to book it in anywhere else before my mot runs out. Appalling service. I will be warning all my friends not to go anywhere near this company.
